check_version.description: Check if version is the same as the server with the given data.

user.description: Create a new user with the given data.

group.description: Create a new user group with the given data.

role.description: Create a new role with the given data.

acl.description: Create a new ACL entry with the given data.

template.description: Create a new template with the given data.

project.description: Create a new project with the given data.

project_load.description: Load a project (local server only) with the given data.

create_compute.description: Create a new compute on the controller with the given data.

add_pool.description: Create a new resource pool with the given data.

install_img.description: Attempt to automatically create templates based on image checksums.

qemu_img.description: Create a new blank Qemu image in a path with the given image_path and data.

node.description: Create a new node in a project with the given project_id and data.

link_create.description: Create a new link in a project with the given project_id and data.

drawing_create.description: Create a new drawing in a project with the given project_id and data.

snapshot_create.description: Create a new snapshot of a project with the given project_id and data.

auto_idlepc.description: Find a suitable Idle-PC value for a given IOS image with the given compute_id and data. This may take a few minutes.

add_applience_version.description: Add a version to an appliance with the given appliance_id and data.

duplicate_template.description: Duplicate a template with the given template_id.

project_close.description: Close a project with the given project_id.

project_open.description: Open a project with the given project_id.

project_lock.description: Lock all drawings and nodes in a given project with the given project_id.

project_unlock.description: Unlock all drawings and nodes in a given project with the given project_id.

start_nodes.description: Start all nodes belonging to a given project with the given project_id.

stop_nodes.description: Stop all nodes belonging to a given project with the given project_id.

suspend_nodes.description: Suspend all nodes belonging to a given project with the given project_id.

reload_nodes.description: Reload all nodes belonging to a given project with the given project_id.

nodes_console_reset.description: Reset console for all nodes belonging to the project with the given project_id.

symbol_create.description: Upload a symbol file with the given symbol_id.

connect_compute.description: Connect to compute on the controller with the given compute_id.

upload_img.description: Upload an image within a path with the given image_path and install_appliances.

project_import.description: Import a project from a portable archive with the given project_id and name.

project_write_file.description: Write a file to a project with the given file_path and project_id.

node_isolate.description: Isolate a node (suspend all attached links) with the given node_id and project_id.

node_unisolate.description: Un-isolate a node (resume all attached suspended links) with the given node_id and project_id.

node_console_reset.description: Reset a console for a given node with the given node_id and project_id.

reset_link.description: Reset a link with the given project_id and link_id.

stop_link_capture.description: Stop packet capture on the link with the given project_id and link_id.

snapshot_restore.description: Restore a snapshot with the given snapshot_id and project_id.

add_applience_version.description: Add a version to an appliance with the given appliance_id and request body.

project_node_from_template.description: Create a new node from a template with the given project_id, template_id and data.

duplicate_node.description: Duplicate a node with the given node_id, project_id and data.

start_link_capture.description: Start packet capture on the link with the given project_id, link_id and data.

create_disk_img.description: Create a Qemu disk image with the given disk_name, node_id, project_id and data

create_node_file.description: Write a file in the node directory with the given file_path, node_id and project_id.
